name: Michael Wynne
title: Digital Applications Librarian
bio: As part of his work for the CDSC, Michael Wynne provides support for Mukurtu users, community workshops and training, and digitization and digital curation workflows.

name: Kimberly Christen
title: Director of Digital Initiatives, College of Arts & Sciences; Director of the CDSC; Director of the Digital Technology and Culture program
bio: Dr. Christen provides strategic planning and oversight for the CDSC, directs grant funded projects, facilitates graduate training and community workshops.

name: Trevor Bond
title: Co-Director, CDSC; Associate Dean for Digital Initiatives and Special Collections
bio: Dr. Trevor James Bond provides strategic planning and oversight for the CDSC, oversees library digitization efforts, and supervises library faculty and staff.

name: Alex Merrill
title: Director of Technology, CDSC; Head of Systems and Technical Operations, WSU Libraries
bio: Alex Merrill manages Mukurtu CMS development, oversees digital projects, digital preservation, curation and discovery for the CDSC.

name: Devin Becker
title: Director of CDIL; Head, Data and Digital Services
bio: Devin Becker leads the development of the CDIL's fellowship program and research activities.

name: Evan Williamson
title: Technical Director, CDIL; Digital Infrastructure Librarian
bio: Evan Williamson manages the technical foundations and directs workshop/pedagogical initiatives of CDIL.
